title: Did the U.S. Navy Shoot Down an Iranian Passenger Jet in 1988, Killing 290 Civilians?
subtitle: The USS Vincennes shot down Iran Air flight 655, killing all 290 civilians aboard in one of the worst naval accidents in U.S. history.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: In 1988, the U.S. Navy shot down an Iranian passenger jet, killing 290 civilians; Some members of the crew that shot the plane down were later awarded medals, and the United States has not formally apologized for the event.
